header.title: XQuery, XPath, and XSLT Functions and Operators Namespace Document

div1.head: Introduction
div1.p: This document describes the namespace &nsname; defined by the and specifications (&date.month; &date.year; versions). This namespace is identified by the namespace prefix fn:, which is a predefined prefix. For updated information, please refer to the latest version of the and specifications.

This document describes the names that are defined in this namespace at the time of publication. The W3C reserves the right to define additional names in this namespace in the future. and are the only specifications that may amend this namespace.
This document contains a directory of links to related resources, using RDDL (as defined in ).
It is GRDDL-enabled (as defined in ), that is to say that a GRDDL-compliant processor can extract useful RDF (as defined in ) representations of the information contained herein.

div1.head: XQuery and XPath Functions
div1.p: This section lists all of the functions defined in the specification. Each function and operator is uniquely identified with a URI of the form: “&nsname;#name” where name is the name of a function or operator, such as “max”: &nsname;#max.

The normative definitions of these functions are in the specification. For convenience, a very brief, non-normative summary of each function is provided. For details, follow the link on the “Summary:” introductory text below each function.

div1.head: XSL Transformations (XSLT) Functions
div1.p: This section lists all of the functions defined in the specification. Each function and operator is uniquely identified with a URI of the form: “&nsname;#name” where name is the name of a function or operator, such as “system-property”: &nsname;#system-property.

The normative definitions of these functions are in the specification. For convenience, a very brief, non-normative summary of each function is provided. For details, follow the link on the “Summary:” introductory text below each function.

div1.head: Normative References
div1.p: These documents describe the names that are defined in this namespace at the time of publication. The W3C reserves the right to define additional names in this namespace in the future.
